data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Costa, Anne M., Calor, Adolfo R. (2014): A new species of Atanatolica Mosely 1936 (Trichoptera: Leptoceridae) from Serra Bonita, Bahia, Brazil. Zootaxa 3790 (1): 194-200, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3790.1.10
